previous.excerpt: DrillRoom introduces AI for interactive pocket billiards training. Practice your fundamentals with the assistance of a virtual coach. Get real time feedback. Know your stats and track your progress over time. Level Up your game!
previous.title: DrillRoom - AI-powered billiard training & stats
